title: What is the interpretation of eating pine nuts in a dream?

preview.html: Trend offers you the complete interpretation of eating pine nuts in a dream. Pine is considered one of the most important types of wood, as it is important for many industries such as furniture, musical instruments, and others. Pine wood kitchen utensils are highly resistant to bacteria. The importance of pine in perfumery is essential when extracting the oil. A pine tree in a dream is full of visions that many people have received, so we have presented to you, dear followers, a complete interpretation of seeing pine trees in a dream through the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. Pines in a dream are full by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a pine planting In a dream, it is full of desirable and good dreams. Seeing walking around pine trees in a dream is a good omen and a sign of a speedy recovery from illness and an end to worries and problems. Also, seeing an entire pine tree cut down in a dream is a sign of estrangement and a quarrel with a loved one. Seeing pine trees In a dream, it is characterized by great wealth that the dreamer will collect, and it is a sign of a peaceful life. Also, seeing pine cones in a dream indicates the weakness of the man and the poor, and is a sign of weakness. Seeing a pine tree in a dream is full of dreams that indicate the dreamer’s success and success in his work and trade. Seeing whole pine cones in a dream indicates an abundance of money. Which the dreamer will reap and is also evidence of the fulfillment of desires. Climbing a whole pine cone in a dream is a sign of traveling and getting out of the difficult situation that the dreamer suffered from. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman eating pine cones? The interpretation of seeing whole pine cones in a dream for an ordinary woman is good news about the coming Goodness and abundance of food for her next life. Seeing one walking among pine trees in a complete dream also indicates that she will get rid of some problems in her life. Seeing someone eating pine nuts in a dream also indicates an imminent marriage for an ordinary woman and the improvement of all her circumstances. Buying pine nuts in a dream is complete for a single girl with visions. Desirable and a sign of great success and achieving difficult things. Seeing pine trees in a dream full of a woman’s bowling is evidence of the presence of a slim and elegant man, because it shows a good person. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman eating pine nuts? Seeing a married woman planting pine trees in a dream is evidence that she will hear happy and cheerful news in the future. Her coming days: Walking in a field full of pine trees in a dream for a married woman is good news, happiness, and a sign of sustenance and a lot of money. When a woman sees herself in a dream full of climbing a pine tree, this is evidence that she will overcome the difficult stages in her life. Eating whole pine nuts in a dream for a woman For a married woman, it is a desirable vision that indicates a quick recovery from illness and improved conditions. Eating pine trees in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of eating pine fruit in a pregnant woman’s complete dream is evidence that she will overcome the problems of pregnancy and will go through an easy birth. Seeing pine trees in a dream full of pregnant women is one of the visions that symbolize Until God gives her a male child

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing apricots in a dream?

preview.html: Hadout website offers you a complete interpretation of seeing apricots in a dream. It is famous for its apricot, which is a delicious fruit with many benefits. Apricots are distinguished by their beautiful taste and wonderful color. It is also eaten fresh or dried. Also, seeing apricots in a complete dream is one of the visions that you can receive in the dream of many people, so we have collected for you, dear in God, all the testimonies related to the interpretation of this dream, as we will do. I give you the interpretation of seeing orange apricots and also the interpretation of seeing dried apricots in a dream is complete. Why do you dream of eating orange apricots? The interpretation of seeing apricots in a dream has been completed, as the scholar Ibn Sirin said about it, among the visions that symbolize the dreamer’s illness. There are also green apricots in a complete dream – Evidence for the dreamer is that he gives a lot of money to the poor and needy. Seeing whole green apricots in a dream is a sign that the patient is recovering. Cutting apricots from a tree in a dream is complete evidence that the dreamer has many bad friends. Picking whole apricots in a dream is a sign that The dreamer will marry a woman who will be rich with a lot of money. See also: Why dream of jam in a dream in detail? Why dream of dried apricots? Dried apricots in a camel’s dream are considered good dreams that show the dreamer that goodness and blessings will enter his life. Also, seeing dried apricots in a dream is complete evidence that the dreamer has morals. Goodness and religion, and evidence of his closeness to God Almighty. Seeing dried apricots in a dream in general is a vision that shows the dreamer broad support and entry into a life full of benefits. One of the visions that came to her is evidence of improving her health and entering into a new life. A dream about apricots for a girl is a sign of a bright future, success, and success in the coming life. Picking apricots in a dream for a wealthy woman means that she will collect a lot of money and is also evidence of her marriage to A rich man. See also: Why dream of seeing whole peaches in a dream? Why dream of eating orange apricots for a married woman? Seeing whole apricots in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the relationship between her husband and her family. Seeing apricot fruits is a sign of children and a good successor in her life, and a tree that has not turned To brown in color is a sign of the bad luck she is experiencing. Also, for a married woman who sees herself in a dream full when she buys apricots, it is a sign of earning a living with a lot of money for her and her family. Seeing juice of whole apricots in a dream means that he will enjoy good health and enter A period full of stability and well-being.See also: Why dream of plums To see plums in a dream wholeWhy dream of apricots in a dream full for a pregnant womanWhy dream of a pregnant woman seeing apricots in a dream full is one of the visions that shows the end of the troubles and problems that she faced due to pregnancy. The dream of eating fresh apricots for a woman It is a sign of kindness

title: Fingers in a dream and the meanings of hands and feet in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of dreams about fingers in a dream through a site in dreams, and see the opinions of dream interpreters by seeing fingers and toes in detail. Fingers in a dreamIn the following lines, we will discuss with you the interpretation of seeing fingers in a dream, the interpretation of toes in a dream, and the interpretation of fingers in a dream, Interpretation of injured fingers in a dream, and the interpretation of that. Dreaming of growing toes for single people, so follow us.Toes in a dreamSeeing toes in a dream indicates the small details of the dreamer’s life and his preoccupation with them.Seeing the loss of a toe in a dream indicates a lack of determination and a lack of energy to do anything.Seeing someone hurting their toe in a dream It indicates feelings of tension, tension, and reluctance to make some decisions. Seeing someone bending down and kissing your toe in a dream means that there is someone who wants to reassure you, push you forward, and encourage you. Seeing nail polish in a dream means self-confidence. Also, painting one’s nails in a dream shows interest and appearance. In front of others and his concern for their faith in him. To see toenails falling out, symbolizes forgetting a small problem. See also: Painting nails in a dream, trimming nails in a dream, fingers in a dream, seeing the fingers of a hand in a dream means a father, mother, good offspring, or a husband. Seeing the five fingers of the right hand in a dream It symbolizes the five daily prayers required of every Muslim. Seeing the thumb in a dream means dawn. Seeing the index finger in a dream symbolizes noon. Seeing the middle finger in a dream is a sign of the evening prayer. Seeing a ring in a dream represents sunset. Seeing a rose in a dream indicates the evening prayer. Seeing extra fingers on the hand indicates an increase in money and children. Seeing an increase in the fingers of the hand in a dream symbolizes the arrival of a source of livelihood and gaining a high status. Seeing a deficiency in the fingers of the hand in a dream means losing money or losing one of the children. Seeing a man He cannot move his fingers in a dream means that he is going through a financial crisis. A man who sees that his fingers are weak in a dream symbolizes that he is going through some family problems. Fingers in an unmarried woman’s dream: Seeing a feeling of pain in the fingers of an unmarried woman’s hand symbolizes that she will be hurt. Seeing the fingers of the hand near an unmarried woman is evidence of their weakness in performing the rituals imposed on them. Seeing injured fingers in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that someone close to her has betrayed and betrayed her. Seeing the fingers of the left hand in a dream for a married woman portends the children of her brother or sister. Cutting fingers in a dream: Seeing fingers cut off in a dream is a sign of negligence in worship, delaying prayer, and interruption of the Sunnah. To see the mutilation of the nail and leaving the finger in a dream symbolizes the interruption of the obligatory prayer. To see someone cutting off his finger and his back restored to health, this indicates strength after weakness, and wealth. After poverty, and guidance after disobedience. It can also indicate the return of kinship after a period of disobedience. Seeing a finger being amputated in a dream means disobeying parents or neglecting children. Seeing yourself being amputated

title: Interpretation of seeing you sweeping in a dream

preview.html:
Interpretation of seeing a dream about sweeping a dream in different situations. Although sweeping in reality is a sign of cleanliness and the desire to get rid of dust and dirt, in a dream it carries many connotations that may indicate goodness or be a sign of evil in some cases so as not to confuse you. In the encyclopedia, we will provide you with a detailed interpretation of the dream of sweeping today’s article, so follow us. Interpretation of sweeping in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentions in a dream of sweeping that it is most often a sign of goodness that the dreamer will obtain in reality. If he is suffering from some crises and problems, then this dream is a sign of Destroying him, God willing, and getting rid of him. This dream could also be a sign that the dreamer is one of the servants who does good to others and always wants to reconcile those who disagree. Ibn Sirin adds that if the fortuneteller falls ill and finds himself in a dream with a vacuum cleaner, then seeing him is a sign of He will recover soon, and God knows best. This vision is also good for the debtor who enjoys comfort and stability after paying his debts. Interpretation of sweeping in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. The interpretation of our eminent scholar Imam Al-Nabulsi agrees with the interpretation of Muhammad bin Sirin, but Al-Nabulsi believes that wiping is only good for those who suffer from some problems. Or worries, illnesses, or debts in reality. .
ZOE. But if the dreamer is blessed with happiness, stability, and wealth, then this dream is a sign of evil, poverty, or illness that will befall him, God forbid. Interpretation of sweeping in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen believes that sweeping in a dream cannot be a sign of goodness, but rather an indication of a state of poverty and weakness. Which the dreamer experiences, God forbid. If the dreamer is sick and finds himself in a dream with a vacuum cleaner, then his dream is a sign of the near term, but he must know that the destination is known only to God Almighty. But if he sees that he is sweeping the mosque, this is considered a sign of good His condition, his fear of God Almighty, and his walking on the path of truth. Interpretation of a sweeper in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man. Interpretation of a sweeper in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a sweeper in a singles’ dream is a sign of the big changes that you will see in life, whether they are related to professional or personal life. If an unmarried woman is suffering from problems and fears, her dream is evidence that she will succeed in getting rid of them and enjoy comfort and happiness. Likewise, if she is in dire need of money, her vision is good news that abundant money will come into her hands. Since sweeping is one of the most important tasks Sweeping in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the collapse of problems and worries that almost upended her life. The survey also showed that she is free of diseases and enjoys health and well-being. In a state of suffering. A married woman has some debts accumulated on her or her husband, then this dream is a sign that they will be paid, God willing. In other cases, especially if the woman lives in a

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing fried fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see fried fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq, and fried fish indicates the abundance of goodness and family or family happiness. Her wedding is coming. Seeing fried fish in a dream has many interpretations and meanings. Dream scholars believe that a fish in a dream refers to a woman, which may indicate that I will get a lot of money, and whoever has a small fish will receive great compensation from God, and his benefit is still valid. Dream of fried fish in dreams, singular, the meaning of fried fish in Dreams of married and pregnant women, see the explanation of fried and grilled fish, the sight of fried fish and rice, the symbol of dead fish, fried fish is loved by many people in reality because of its delicious taste, but when you see it in a dream, and through this article we will understand it by seeing fried fish in a dream in detail according to the interpretation Leading jurists and translators.Interpretation of seeing fried fish by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of dreaming of fried fish in a dream is an ideal dream because it indicates obtaining financial benefits after a lot of hard work.Seeing yourself eating fried fish in a dream means achieving ambitions and aspirations, achieving desired goals, and success in professional life. Dreaming of eating fried fish in a dream indicates good news, good luck, and many happy occasions. Dreaming of big fried fish in dreams is one of the desired visions, heralding many beautiful and spacious livelihoods and financial blessings. Read also: Dream interpretation of seeing fishing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation Dreaming of fried fish by Ibn Sirin: Dreaming that you are eating fried fish in a dream is a symptom of close travel and maintaining or increasing knowledge from one place to another by doing business. Tasting delicious fried fish in a dream indicates marriage to a beautiful woman or an increase in the number of offspring. Seeing a fried fish in a dream indicates the presence of many disagreements and problems with family and friends and severing of the family. The dream of seeing fried fish in oil in a dream indicates great luck and many material benefits. Interpretation of seeing fried fish for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about fried fish in a girl’s dream indicates achieving Her dreams and desires. The dream of preparing fried fish appears in a girl’s dream near the date of her wedding. If you see her eating rotten fried fish in an unmarried woman’s dream, this indicates hearing bad news and the problem has entered into a bad psychological state. Read also: Dream interpretation of seeing raw fish Or grilled or fried in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about fried fish for a married woman. The interpretation of a married woman who saw a fish in a dream indicates that she often faces quarrels and problems with her husband, which may lead to separation. Dreaming about eating a small fried fish in a married woman’s dream proves jealousy and hatred for those around her. A large fried fish appears in a married woman’s dream, indicating that if she has not given birth yet and the number of offspring increases, she will become pregnant soon. Seeing eating fried fish in a married woman’s dream indicates...

title: Interpretation of toothache in a dream and dream of teeth

preview.html: Seeing a toothache in a dream symbolizes problems and quarrels with parents and relatives, and may indicate hatred and harsh words. Whoever sees his lower teeth hurting in a dream, this indicates the presence of problems between women in the family and seeing a toothache in the teeth. The dream indicates disagreements between brothers, and the dream of teeth taking off shows the differences between the boat and the severance of relations with them, and God knows best. Interpretation of toothache in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing toothache in a dream is problems with relatives and bad circumstances with them, and whoever sees his teeth hurting in a dream, this indicates cruelty. In treating relatives, it is as heavy as pain, and seeing and feeling anesthesia applied to a toothache in a dream indicates disappointment and betrayal that befalls him. Watching others. Ibn Shaheen says: Seeing a toothache in a dream means hateful words that the dreamer hears. Whoever sees that he is pulling his teeth and it hurts him in the dream, he spends his money on coercion, and if you see your tooth appearing in a dream, this indicates the occurrence of evil and calamity. Pain at the dentist indicates In a dream, to fatigue coming from the dreamer from others, and if you see your dentist treating your pain in the dream, this indicates that you will receive help from others. Gustav Miller says, “If you see that you have your teeth extracted and you feel pain in a dream, this means that you are getting into things that cause you sadness And fatigue. A serious illness. Dream interpretation of lower tooth pain. Seeing lower tooth pain in a dream indicates the presence of problems between female relatives. Whoever sees his lower teeth crumbling and hurting in a dream, this indicates the end of the relationship with relatives, especially women, and seeing lower tooth pain and movement in a dream indicates a lot of temptation and gossip between people. Women, seeing pain in the lower molars in a dream indicates excessive fatigue for the grandmother. Seeing pain in the lower teeth on the right side in the dream indicates the presence of problems with female relatives on the grandfather’s side, and whoever sees pain in his lower teeth on the left side in a dream, this indicates Having disagreements with female relatives on his side. Grandmothers. Seeing the pain of the lower teeth and their extraction in a dream means severing the family, and whoever sees his lower teeth falling out after the pain in the dream, this indicates a scandal that affects the honor of the family. Seeing the feeling of pain in the lower teeth during their extraction in a dream indicates sadness over the rupture and its aftermath, while pain in Lower teeth after implantation in a dream indicate a failure to restore and restore relationships, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about pain in the front teeth. If you see pain in the front teeth in a dream, this indicates the presence of differences between siblings. And whoever sees his lower front teeth hurting in a dream, this indicates fears. Coming from the side of the brothers, and seeing pain in the upper front teeth in a dream shows fatigue coming on the part of the brothers, and feeling pain in the teeth in the dream indicates a dispute with the uncles. Pain and movement of the front teeth in the dream indicate many quarrels between the brothers, and whoever sees his front teeth bleeding and hurting

Pain and movement of the front teeth in the dream indicate many quarrels between the brothers, and whoever sees his front teeth bleeding and hurting

title: Interpretation of seeing a rat in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a rat in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq who left in the dream. A rat is a rodent that disgusts and disgusts many people. Some feel fear and anxiety because it causes many different diseases, but what about seeing a rat in a dream? This vision causes anxiety and is dangerous for whoever sees it. It forces them to search for an explanation for this vision, which has many different meanings and interpretations, but in general, seeing a rat in a dream is an unwanted vision. We will learn about the interpretation of seeing a rat in a dream from Imam Al-Sadiq through this article in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing a rat in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: Imam Al-Sadiq says: If a person sees a mouse in his dream, this vision indicates the presence of a deceitful person in this person’s life and causes him a lot of trouble. Problems and intrigues, but he explains the opposite. But if a person sees in a dream that he is walking on the road and is chased by a group of rats, then this vision shows that this person suffers from instability and suffers from extreme fear, and this vision also shows the instability of the country. But if he sees A man sees a black rat in his dream. This vision is considered one of the unpleasant visions because it indicates that this person will be imprisoned, and this vision indicates that the person will suffer from serious financial problems. But if a person sees a very large and obese rat in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer is involved. In illegal trade, and this person acquires a lot of money through forbidden means, and this vision indicates that the dreamer is walking on a forbidden path. But if the young man sees in a dream that there is a large group of rats surrounding him, then this vision indicates that this young man will suffer from an epidemic. He and his family are very distressed, and this vision also indicates a severe lack of money. Interpretation of seeing a rat in an unmarried girl’s dream according to Imam al-Sadiq: Imam al-Sadiq says that if an unmarried girl sees a rat in her dream, this means that she is suffering from psychological pressures and is suffering from many pressures in Her daily life, which makes it intense. If an unmarried girl sees that she is chasing rats and killing them, this vision indicates that she will get rid of the problems and fears that she suffers from in her life, but if she sees that she is holding a rat in her hands, this indicates that a great calamity will reach her to a great extent. On the other hand, if the vision of mice is repeated in one girl’s dream on an ongoing basis, then this vision indicates that the unmarried girl is constantly thinking about a lot of bad and unpleasant things, and this vision may indicate that she is committing a lot. Mistakes and sins. Interpretation of seeing a rat in a married woman’s dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: Imam Al-Sadiq says that if a married woman sees a rat in her dream, this means a great loss of money if the color of the rat is black and large in size, and seeing a large rat in the house indicates poverty and trouble. She will be stuck at home for a long time. But if a married woman sees a group of rats entering her house, this vision indicates that this woman will suffer from a wide range of problems.

She will be stuck at home for a long time. But if a married woman sees a group of rats entering her house, this vision indicates that this woman will suffer from a wide range of problems.

title: Success in a dream: Interpretation of a dream of success and excellence in studies

preview.html: There is no doubt, brothers and sisters, that success is a dream that haunts us when we are awake, and when we see success in our dreams, it shows how attached we are to goals or objectives. Its image of us, which makes us aware of it for a while, raises it a little, and then does not let it go until we bring it into alert. Because only a successful person sees his success in his dream before he wakes up, but a failed or backward person does not even see success in his dream. Interpretation of a dream about success in one dreamSuccess in one dream indicates payment in any matter. If a girl sees that she has passed a debate, certificate, or exam, this means that her wish has been fulfilled. If the girl is still studying at the institute or university, and she sees in her dream the result of the exam, and it looks good or positive, then the dream indicates that the efforts or actions will be crowned with victory, God willing. Success in one dream can indicate joy or happiness soon, and success is a symbol To get married sometimes, especially if you are going to see the certificate. Perhaps success in baccalaureate or high school indicates a connection because this certificate of awakening paves the way for a successful future or life, whether in study, work, or life in general. Interpretation of a dream of success in a married woman’s dreamSuccess in a married woman’s dreams indicates her success in public life if the woman sees For a married woman, she has succeeded in studying, then her interpretation is good, and it is most likely that this dream translates into the success of her children or her husband. Success in the past embodies a woman’s most important priorities, as it begins with study, then work, then marriage. Success is then embedded in the subconscious or unconscious mind as a symbol of goals, purposes and even desires. When a woman’s mind is preoccupied with something that is dominated by optimism or wishful thinking, a dream of success appears in her dream to indicate the possibility of achieving the desire, especially if the married woman has achieved success in the past. If the dream of success is repeated in a married woman’s dream, this is a precursor to achieving real success in waking life, The vision may indicate the fulfillment of a big dream, especially if the success is brilliant or superior. Interpretation of success in a dream for a pregnant womanSuccess in a pregnant woman’s dream can convey the following meanings (salvation, relief, comfort, joy, comfort). If a pregnant woman sees that she has passed an examination Or a test or discussion, this is her interpretation of a successful pregnancy. The pregnant woman’s success in her dream is an expression of her salvation or the approaching time of her blessed birth. Interpretation of the dream of success in the dream of a single or married man. Success in a man’s dream expresses his ambitions and desires. If a man sees in a dream that he was able to obtain a certificate, this is evidence of his success in reality. In the dream, it is like obtaining a certificate stamp. Of course, this is the interpretation of marriage, but if the man is married and sees in his dream the success of his children, this heralds goodness for their future, and success in the merchant’s dream is a profit, and in his dream, the righteous sheikh refers to Hajj or Umrah, and perhaps success indicates wealth or bliss. Success in studying in a dream. Study or study in dreams refers to

title: Interpretation of a dream that he wrote the book or carried the Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about writing a book or carrying the Qur’an in a dream. The moments of the marriage contract are the moments in which a person feels most happy and anxious. The marriage contract is a contract that entails many duties and responsibilities. God Almighty described it as a map of a heavy covenant. Seeing a marriage contract in a dream has meanings and connections. Multiple, but overall it carries a lot of news. Good for the dreamer, and we will discuss it through the lines of the article to clarify. Interpretation of dream books or carrying the Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about writing the book to a familiar person. Signing a marriage contract in a dream from a familiar person is a sign of the good that the dreamer gets from this person, and the dreamer’s vision that he is entering into marriage with a woman he knows, This means entering into a partnership with her. The interpretation of a dream about marrying a well-known person also indicates the following concepts: Accepting a marriage contract in a dream means satisfying desires and desires. If the marriage contract in a dream is for a married woman, it means that the dreamer controls his work. This also means that The dreamer will make a lot of profits from his work. Seeing the dreamer performing his marriage contract with a divorced woman he knows means that he is sponsoring her in reality. A book written by a woman in a dream for a rich man who has a lot of money is not very promising. This indicates that the dreamer is falling into fraud. Save the marriage contract With a sinner means that the dreamer is involved in immorality and participating in deviation. The dreamer seeing that she is concluding her marriage contract with a sheikh or a person of knowledge, this is evidence that she will benefit from his knowledge. Compiling the Qur’an in a dream for a poor woman means that she will gain contentment and happiness in this world. While the dreamer sees herself tying the knot with a famous person, this indicates that she will achieve her ambitions. Keeping the marriage contract for the lover means success in work and assuming responsibilities. See also: Interpretation of seeing bathing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the Qur’an recited in a dream for a man. The marriage contract in a dream for a man indicates that the dreamer He bears the responsibilities assigned to him, and this may also indicate that he is entering a new job or working in trade. A man in a dream, if he sees that he is executing his marriage contract with a woman he knows, indicates that he will obtain a benefit through it. When he sees a man writing his book about a woman who does not He knows it, it means that he is suffering from a health problem and that he is involved in matters whose consequences are not clear. Perhaps seeing a marriage contract in a dream indicates new obligations that will fall on him. Signing a marriage contract for a man in a dream means that he is fulfilling the promises and covenants he made to himself. The brother wrote a book In a dream about a man, which means that he supports and supports him. Seeing a man contracting his marriage with a girl close to him indicates his high status and rank, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing a wasp in a dream and its effects. Interpretation of seeing the Qur’an in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she She enters into a marriage contract with a man she loves, which means that she is making efforts to build a cohesive family dominated by friendship and love. Also, a marriage contract in a dream for a married woman means that she will achieve her goals. The dreamer shows the
